entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-foundation-fabric
entry.content: End-to-end modular samples and landing zones toolkit for Terraform on GCP.

entry.title: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cluster-toolkit
entry.content: Cluster Toolkit is an open-source software offered by Google Cloud which makes it easy for customers to deploy AI/ML and HPC environments on Google Cloud.

entry.title: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-aws-ecs-container-definition
entry.content: Terraform module to generate well-formed JSON documents (container definitions) that are passed to the aws_ecs_task_definition Terraform resource
